# Overview

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository contains the corpus data and grammaticality judgement results underlying our paper on *ka*- and -*a* passives in Balinese. In addition, it includes R code file documenting steps for our statistical analyses and visualisation output. The paper has been peer-reviewed, accepted, and is to appear in [*Linguistics Vanguard*](https://www.degruyter.com/journal/key/lingvan/html).

## How to cite

> Udayana, I. N., Rajeg, G. P. W., & Puspani, I. A. M. (2024). Supplementary materials for “The (non-)canonical status of the *ka*- passive in Balinese” (Version 0.0.1) [Computer software]. https://github.com/cirhss/balinese-passive https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/8H2AT
